languageKey.label: MOOX-Frontend-User
Frontend user login, registration, password recovery, profile etc.

recovery email template

Rules
Activated : An object that sets wich validation rules are activated. By changing this object is possible to deactivate some validations, or to activate them for extra security.
Scores : Scores returned by the rules when they match. Negative values are for penalizations.
Error Messages
Verdicts : Pwstrength display names for the verdicts related to the progressClass. It has to have 5 elements, and they would be the 5 possible strength categories.

Regeln
Activated : An object that sets wich validation rules are activated. By changing this object is possible to deactivate some validations, or to activate them for extra security.
Scores : Scores returned by the rules when they match. Negative values are for penalizations.
Verdicts : Pwstrength display names for the verdicts related to the progressClass. It has to have 5 elements, and they would be the 5 possible strength categories.
